summary: This bill, the "Finish the Wall Act," directs the Secretary of Homeland Security to immediately resume all construction activities for the border wall system on the U.S.-Mexico border that were planned or underway before January 20, 2021. It prohibits the cancellation of existing construction contracts and mandates the use of all funds previously appropriated for the wall since October 2016. The bill requires the submission of implementation plans to Congress for completing the project by September 2026. It also requires ensuring compliance with federal DNA collection laws at border facilities.
